"We will collect and use your personal data if you choose to use our services. Here's the data that we'll collect: 1. Secure URLs: We'll collect the URLs of the websites you visit while using our services. 2. Location data: We'll access your location info. That's how we use the data we collect: 1. Security: We use your data when we protect your device from fraud and viruses, as well as for storage and backup reasons. 2. Content: Your data helps us provide relevant localized news content. Browser needs to connect to the internet to work normally. You must agree to our %2$s and %1$s to be able to use Browser.​"
